name: Gladiabots
description: AI COMBAT ARENA - Assemble your robot squad, construct their AI and send them in the battle arena to see your strategy play out. Iterate, improve and repeat until you outsmart all your opponents and friends online.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better. Storage: 200 MB available space
